event_content: Bangalore Airport's Terminal 2 is a masterpiece of sustainable design. From the green walls to the natural ventilation, it's a testament to responsible architecture. Truly inspiring! #SustainableArchitecture #BangaloreAirport #GreenDesign

event_title: Thanking passengers for their feedback on Terminal 2.
clean_event_text: Thanking passengers for their feedback on Terminal 2.
event_content: We are overwhelmed by the positive feedback on Terminal 2 at Bangalore Airport! Your suggestions help us improve and provide a world-class experience. Thank you for making us proud! #BLRAirport #PassengerLove #ThankYou

event_title: Picking up international wedding guests from Bangalore Airport.
clean_event_text: Picking up international wedding guests from Bangalore Airport.
event_content: The wedding festivities begin with international guests arriving at Bangalore Airport! So much excitement and joy. Get ready for an unforgettable Indian wedding! #IndianWedding #BangaloreAirport #WeddingGuests

event_title: Bangalore Airport as the gateway to Karnataka's hidden gems.
clean_event_text: Bangalore Airport as the gateway to Karnataka's hidden gems.
event_content: Bangalore Airport is your perfect starting point to uncover Karnataka's hidden gems! From ancient temples to lush Western Ghats, the adventure awaits. #ExploreKarnataka #BangaloreAirport #TravelIndia

event_title: Flying out of Bangalore Airport for an important summit.
clean_event_text: Flying out of Bangalore Airport for an important summit.
event_content: Early morning flight from Bangalore Airport for a crucial international business summit. Prepared for productive discussions and networking. #BusinessTrip #BangaloreAirport #GlobalSummit

event_title: Making travel fun for kids at Bangalore Airport.
clean_event_text: Making travel fun for kids at Bangalore Airport.
event_content: Finding ways to make airport time fun for the little ones at Bangalore Airport! The play areas and kid-friendly dining options are a blessing. Happy kids, happy parents! #KidsTravel #BangaloreAirport #FamilyFun

event_title: Starting a trekking expedition from Bangalore Airport.
clean_event_text: Starting a trekking expedition from Bangalore Airport.
event_content: Gear checked, spirits high! Kicking off an exciting trekking expedition from Bangalore Airport. Ready to conquer some mountains! #AdventureTravel #BangaloreAirport #TrekkingIndia

event_title: Grab-and-go food options at Bangalore Airport reviewed.
clean_event_text: Grab-and-go food options at Bangalore Airport reviewed.
event_content: Quick review of grab-and-go food options at Bangalore Airport. Perfect for those tight connection times! Found some decent sandwiches and fresh juices. #BangaloreFood #BangaloreAirport #AirportEats

event_title: Showcasing Indian heritage through art at Bangalore Airport.
clean_event_text: Showcasing Indian heritage through art at Bangalore Airport.
event_content: The integration of Indian art and cultural elements at Bangalore Airport's new terminal is truly commendable. It's a fantastic showcase of our rich heritage for global travelers. #IndianCulture #BangaloreAirport #ArtAndTravel

event_title: Departing from Bangalore Airport after a memorable trip.
clean_event_text: Departing from Bangalore Airport after a memorable trip.
event_content: Bidding adieu to Bangalore Airport after an incredible journey through Karnataka. So many memories made, already planning my next visit! #TravelIndia #BangaloreAirport #Goodbye
